actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide for the protection, use and enjoyment of the aesthetic and recreational values inherent in the Federal lands and water at East Park and Stony Gorge Reservoir, Orland Project, California.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to develop, operate, and maintain short-term recreational facilities and to administer the Federal land and water areas associated with the East Park and Stony Gorge Reservoirs, Orland project, California. Authorizes the Secretary to issue necessary rules and regulations and to enter into an agreement with the State of California to develop a recreation management plan for such areas. Authorizes the appropriation of $4,000,000 for such purposes and authorizes the appropriation of any necessary funds for administration of existing facilities and for operation and maintenance of facilities authorized by this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide for the protection, use and enjoyment of the aesthetic and recreational values inherent in the Federal lands and water at East Park and Stony Gorge Reservoir, Orland Project, California.
